form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tuberville introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To eliminate statutory provisions relating to diversity, equity, and inclusion in the Department of Defense.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Lethality Act.

section.header: Elimination of statutory provisions relating to diversity, equity, and inclusion in the Department of Defense

subsection.text: Section 113 of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3) and (4) as paragraphs (2) and (3), respectively;
by redesignating clauses (viii), (ix), and (x) as clauses (vii), (viii), and (ix), respectively;
in paragraph (1), by striking to measure— and all that follows through (C) the efforts and inserting to measure the efforts; and

clause.text: by striking shall— and all that follows through (A) ensure that and inserting shall ensure that;
by striking the semicolon after extent practicable and inserting a period; and

subparagraph.text: by striking , disaggregated by gender, race, and ethnicity, each place it appears;
in paragraph (1), by striking disaggregated by gender, race, and ethnicity,; and
in paragraph (9), by striking , gender, race, and ethnicity.

subsection.header: Chief diversity officer of the department of defense
subsection.text: Section 147 of title 10, United States Code, is repealed.

paragraph.text: Title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in section 573(b), by striking The members of a selection and all that follows through extent practicable.;
in section 612(a)(1), by striking The members of a selection and all that follows through extent practicable.; and
in section 14102(b), by striking The members of a selection and all that follows through extent practicable..

paragraph.text: Section 503(c) of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (Public Law 116–283; 10 U.S.C. 573 note) is repealed.

subsection.text: Section 656 of title 10, United States Code, is repealed.

subsection.header: Identification of gender or personal pronouns in official correspondence
subsection.text: Section 986 of title 10, United States Code, is repealed.
Section 2001(a)(1)(B) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking include and all that follows through the period and inserting shall include honor, excellence, courage, and commitment..

subsection.header: Strategic plan for diversity and inclusion
subsection.text: Section 529 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 (Public Law 116–92; 10 U.S.C. 656 note) is repealed.

subsection.header: Senior advisors for diversity and inclusion for the military departments and coast guard
subsection.text: Section 913(b) of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (Public Law 116–283; 10 U.S.C. 147 note) is repealed.
Section 118(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking to carry out— and all that follows through (2) guidance and inserting to carry out guidance.
